name: Rocket Maze (Banana is Chomsy)
description:
Looking for a pretty mild challenge? Then you have come to the right place. Rocket Maze is a casual game for all ages who just want to burn time in their office or school. The game requires you to focus because men those walls ain't got no mercy.

The core mechanic of the game is to avoid touching the red walls while trying to search for the goal, and I almost forgot to mention, keep track of your fuel. The maze is randomly generated so each maze will never be the same as before so there is no use in memorizing the paths.

Good luck and have fun!
